lender.name: Roseann & Ren
lender.loan_because: We run a non profit that helps cancer patients and their families. So, we know that it sometimes takes so little to make a big impact on peoples lives
lender.occupational_info: We run a small foundation that provides comfort and aid to cancer patients and their families.

lender.name: Marek
lender.loan_because: I want to give people a chance to improve the life... to give a "hook to hunt a lot of fishes" instead "a single fish to instant eat". i was lucky to be born in Europe... and i want to help people who dont have such a chance to earn money as i have..... good luck ... Enterpreneurs... World will be YOURS :))
lender.occupational_info: Im a medicine docor and cure back problems. means im chiropractor. many of my patients are wealthy... i charge good money from them.. and other my patients are poor... from them i take no money. no mater if they rrich or poor i treat their back problems the best i can.

lender.name: Ellen
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to help make the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I work to ensure that non-profits have enough resources to do their work. I ask people to invest in worthy causes.

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: Think of giving not as a duty but as a privilege. - John D. Rockefeller Jr.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I think it's important to help others whenever possible. I also love the idea that this is the gift that keeps giving.

lender.name: Francoise
lender.loan_because: I want to help.

lender.name: Evidently
lender.loan_because: Our company charity of choice. Looking to make a real difference to real people.

lender.name: Caitlin
lender.loan_because:
To live in a privileged world by a chance of birth and do nothing for those who do not or will not have the same opportunities/advantages by that same chance of birth is the same as condemning those persons to the slightest turning of the winds. Tragedies both personal and collective can sometimes be avoided or lessened by a little help here and there, so why not just try?
"We want moral progress to burst up from below, rather than waiting patiently upon condescension from the top." --Richard Rorty ("Human Rights, Rationality and Sentimentality," 1993)
lender.occupational_info: I am a full time student earning my bachelors degree in International Conflict Studies so that one day we may better prevent conflict without having to start a "preventative war". I also work part time in as a sales person in two shops.

lender.name: Marta Leocádio
lender.loan_because: I want to help someone!

lender.name: Therese
lender.loan_because: I believe in preserving dignity, self esteme and hard work as a means of getting out of poverty rather than handouts.

lender.name: Joao
lender.loan_because: Every loan makes a difference

lender.name: LUIZ HENRIQUE
lender.whereabouts: rio de janeiro rio de janeiro
lender.loan_because: Investment in computer science equipment(computers). For Software development in Java.
lender.occupational_info: A minha empresa tem um ano de mercado, e já ganhamos bastante espaço em um curto espaço de tempo. Acredito que a informática é o futuro e todo investimento é válido. Preciso da mais computadores para colocar empregar mais funcionários.

lender.name: Bryne
lender.loan_because: Local businesses and organizations are key to a community's future.
lender.occupational_info: I ask community members to donate money to social service organizations.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I can, and it helps other people who need it.
lender.occupational_info: school - its the same everywhere isnt it???

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I want to help those who are less fortunate and trying to make a better life for themselves.

lender.name: Ron
lender.loan_because: I want to pay it forward....
lender.occupational_info: I help sellers market ther property and buyers find their dream home.

lender.name: Mason and Aidan
lender.loan_because: We want to help people have a better life and our grandmother gave us a gift certificate for Christmas to help get us started.

lender.name: Walter
lender.loan_because: Building enterprising people all over the world helps move toward the Millenium Development Goals

lender.name: Kastens Family
lender.loan_because: We have been blessed and we feel the responsibility to be a blessing to others in return.
lender.occupational_info: Ron is a pastor of a Christian church, trying to help people live in the way of Jesus. Stacey is a substitute school teacher. Brennan, Dallas, and Marlee are students.

lender.name: Jewel M
lender.loan_because: I have been in a position of needing extra finance, and those who were gracious enough to loan to me will always be cherished.
lender.occupational_info: I work with young people who do not feel good enough about themselves to be all that they can be. I try to encourage them to believe in themselves.

lender.name: Karl
lender.loan_because: I love improving people's lives!
lender.occupational_info: I work for Intel Corporation. Intel developes and manufactures the technology inside the best computers in the world. I personally work to ensure consumers understand what technology is best for them.

lender.name: Feeney Family
lender.loan_because: It is an incredible feeling to help someone change their life.

lender.name: Lois
lender.loan_because: I love to give

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: If you are able to help you should help.

lender.name: Charlotte
lender.loan_because: I think this is a wonderful way to empower people and let them take charge of their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I help people with solve problems by finding them resources and I also talk with them about emotional problems and try to help them find a way to feel better.

lender.name: Skipper
lender.loan_because: It's important

lender.name: HU PolSci Majors
lender.loan_because: We believe that giving a little can mean a lot for people in developing regions of the world.
lender.occupational_info: We are political science majors at Harding University in Searcy, Arkansas, USA.

lender.name: Gail
lender.loan_because: I have the resources to live a healthy, happy life, and I wish for others to be able to do the same.
lender.occupational_info: I am a graduate student in mathematical modeling. In my spare time, I write about baseball for newsletters and online sites.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I hope it helps

lender.name: Noah
lender.occupation: I'm a kid who likes to play with Legos
lender.loan_because: I want to help people because I love Jesus.
lender.occupational_info: I'm 10 years old. I play with Legos and it's fun. My favorite food is not pizza, it's quesadillas and fish tacos. I have one 6 year old brother and a really cute baby brother.

lender.name: Hannah
lender.loan_because: everyone should have the chance to create the life they want

lender.name: Bakhshi Family
lender.loan_because:
"The bread in your cupboard belongs to the hungry man; the coat hanging unused in your closet belongs to the man who needs it; the shoes rotting in your closet belong to the man who has none; the money which you hoard in the bank belongs to the poor. You do wrong to everyone you could help, but fail to help." St. Basil the Great
We hope participating in these types of experiences will help to instill a strong value in our children which will be upheld long after us.

lender.name: Eve Reinhardt
lender.occupational_info: Documentary production. Economic Development and Public Health studies

lender.name: Kristin
lender.loan_because: Kiva lets us practice what Margaret Mead observed, "Never doubt a small group of committed [in this case global] citizens can change the world... Indeed, it's the only thing that ever has." Join in and make some change.
lender.occupational_info: In work and in life, I aim to make economies and communities work better for more people -- while making new friends, learning new things, and finding new sources of wonder along the way.

lender.name: Phoenix
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people help themselves.

lender.name: Frances and Stephen
lender.loan_because: It's so easy and rewarding. I can't think of a better use of money.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English as a second language

lender.name: Shelley
lender.loan_because: What comes around, goes around.
lender.occupational_info: My husband and I operate an Electrical Contracting business, as well as a Sheep farm and a Gift Basket business.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I think Kiva is a wonderful program and is changing lives everyday. I feel honored to be part of this program and will continue to give as long as there are people in need.
lender.occupational_info: I own a flight school, am a licenced contractor, and work full time for a defense contractor.

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: Poverty is the main source of strife in the world. Resisting poverty is promoting peace.

lender.name: lee
lender.loan_because: it's important.
lender.occupational_info: I invest in entrepreneurs with good ideas and high growth opportunities.

lender.name: Amber & David
lender.loan_because: We want to touch people's lives in a positive way and share God's love and blessings with the world. There is no better investment than people.
lender.occupational_info: We build businesses and invest in assets that generate income, so we don't have to work for money. This enables us to live and work anywhere in the world and spend time on what matters to us (people and relationships).

lender.name: Tally
lender.loan_because: I am inspired by the entrepreneurial spirit

lender.name: Nickola for Michael
lender.loan_because: I have too much while so many have too little. We must share our good fortune so that someday all people may be truly equal. Michael passed away on Feb. 15, but will continue to loan in his name.
lender.occupational_info:
I design electronics equipment for large satellite systems.
I am a retired elementary teacher, who now teaches teachers.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I have had an enormous amount of opportunity throughout my life, and I think everyone should be afforded the same chances.
lender.occupational_info: I work in rehabilitation at a large hospital. My patients are recovering from orthopedic surgeries and other events such as stroke, spinal cord injuries, etc.

lender.name: Fritz Family
lender.loan_because: I think that programs like this are real positive forces in the world, both economically and socially. Having the ability to impact someone's life so greatly with so little is very humbling and rewarding.
lender.occupational_info: General Manager of a Global Mobility organization.

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: How can you not do your part to help others who want to improve their lives and our world?

lender.name: Lisamarie
lender.loan_because: I love to help people, especially those who are trying to help themselves. Everyone needs a hand at some point in their life.
lender.occupational_info: I work in education. I was a school teacher, now I help special education and at-risk children by finding volunteers for their classrooms. I also train people, where I work, to help others.

lender.name: The Crenshaws
lender.loan_because: As business owners, we understand the risk and rewards of starting your own business. And more importantly, how access to capital can impact not only a family, but an entire community.
lender.occupational_info:
I help companies reach their corpoate goals through the use of promotional marketing, printing and branding programs.
She runs a search firm in the healthcare IT industry.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: Loans make people independent instead of dependent on charity.

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: I find it very interesting.
lender.occupational_info: I import goods from China and travel there often.

lender.name: Debra
lender.loan_because: We are all in this together, so we must take care of each other. Many have helped me along the way, and continue to do so, therfore, I am deeply humbled and honored for the privelage in keeping the "goodness" moving! Amen
lender.occupational_info: Just try to help people as much as I'm able to.

lender.name: L. Del Carmen_UnA
lender.loan_because: I'm also a small business owner & I'm aware of how difficult it is to get started. Also helping others it's satisfying enough.. Yo tambien empeze mi negocio & se lo dificil que puede ser. Tambien poder ayudar a las personas en algo, aunque sea con poco es una gran satisfaccion.
lender.occupational_info: I do floral work for Weddings & Corporate Events. I'm also a full time Horticulturist, doing indoor plantscaping in New York City.

lender.name: The Tomato Boys
lender.loan_because: We want to share our profits with other entrepreneurs in need.
lender.occupational_info: We are 3 brothers who run a tomato stand outside of our California home.

lender.name: Bela & Cherry
lender.loan_because: People have helped us in the past and now its our turn.

lender.name: A & A plus T
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to fulfill their dreams! Never loose hope!
lender.occupational_info: We have been working side by side for 21 years. We have created a business from the ground up to support our family and others. Giving back to our community is always on our minds. Helping others help themselves always gives us a warm and fussy feeling inside. Good All over!

lender.name: Joanne
lender.loan_because: Every little thing makes a difference.

lender.name: Fernando
lender.loan_because: It is time to stop the endless talk and start to act. People need help now and together we can make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I am responsible for hiring, training and developing people. One of my main challenges is to attract and retain high potential professionals. At the end of the day I work with people!

lender.name: Tina
lender.loan_because: I want to empower others to make a better life for themselves. I believe a small amount goes a long way.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a Sales Director at an online advertising network. I assist organizations with their online marketing initiatives.

lender.name: FRC SIFE
lender.loan_because: Give a man a fish feed him for a day; Teach a man to fish feed him for life
lender.occupational_info: College students that want to change the world though empowering others

lender.name: JOANNA
lender.loan_because: it is a wonderful gift Kiva has given to make it possible to easily give directly to people to give them an opprotunity to create their own success. we are lucky to have been born into a life of great opportunity and fortune as most have little access to opportunities that we have.
lender.occupational_info: i am a wife, mother, volunteer, entrepreneur and film & visual effects producer .

lender.name: KLo
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping others help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am a stay at home mom with 2 little boys and a loving husband.

lender.name: Jeff & MB
lender.loan_because: We learned about Micro Loans through the book, "Banker to the Poor" by Muhammad Yunas. We wanted to be part of the miracle of empowering people to bring themselves to the next step on a road to financial security.
lender.occupational_info: Student / Accountant

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: This is one of the best ways to help my family throughout the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Member of the Baha'i Faith and we believe that all people are a part of one family: the Human Family.

lender.name: M and N
lender.occupation: Electrical contracting and Internet business owner
lender.loan_because: We think we are all in this world to share and to progress. If we progress why shouldn't you? Let the good things spread around!
lender.occupational_info: We are entrepreneurs, just like the people here borrowing.

lender.name: Rene
lender.loan_because: It is a way to put money to work, so I can earn money and help other people with creditablity., and I would like to have money loaned to me in times I need money. We help each other in need.
lender.occupational_info: I work on California Landlord & tennant, California Traffic cases, U.S. Immigration cases, Tort claims, Breach of contracts claims, Property damage, business disputes. I type up pleadings and motions in these California cases.

lender.name: Charles and Mary Ella
lender.loan_because: Jesus gave his life on a cross to save me; the least I can do is give to help others!
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired Christian pastor and now a Marketplace Chaplain in South Georgia and a missionary to the Navajo Reservation in Arizona.

lender.name: Brent & Mary
lender.loan_because: We want to make a difference in this world of ours, what better way than to help those who are trying to better themselves and the communities they live in.
lender.occupational_info: Mary is an Independant Sales Director with Mary Kay Cosmetics and I am a Operations Mgr. with an Automotive Aftermarket Wholesale Distributor in Washington.

lender.name: Edward
lender.loan_because: When I showed my 13 year old daughter the very first Entrepreneur, she exclaimed, "What a wonderful program! Let's give them the rest of the loan."

lender.name: Øyvind
lender.loan_because: Because it helps other people around the world to get a better life.
lender.occupational_info: Fun and entertaining.

lender.name: Craig
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves the chance to make life better and happier for themselves and their children.
lender.occupational_info: I make art images on the computer for companies to advertise their products.

lender.name: Joan
lender.loan_because: you guys deserve the help because you are making something out of yourselves and i know you are putting the money to good use ... best of luck
lender.occupational_info: i help take sick or injured people to the hospital in an ambulance... also i work at a carwash =)

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good.
lender.occupational_info: I supply clean needles to illicit drug users in order to help slow the spread of HIV and Hepatitis C.

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: I could not have been successful in my life without loans. The credit I have received has empowered me immensely. I think everyone should have access to this powerful tool. I hope that the people I lend to become so successful that they can help others in need.
lender.occupational_info: I manage and raise money for service organizations (NGOs). I like to help organizations overcome problems and become more efficient. I also sometimes work with small businesses to help improve their marketing efforts.

lender.name: Rene
lender.loan_because: paying it forward is as important as paying it back.

lender.name: Anthony
lender.loan_because: Assisting others to help themselves through a loan is much better than a charitable handout. Self reliance through financial independence is much better for the soul than a life of desperate dependence.
lender.occupational_info: I maintain a number of residential rental property buildings. The cleaning and gardening of common areas, general maintenance services, garbage and recycling removal, painting and the co-ordination of any plumbing and electrical work.

lender.name: Deb
lender.loan_because: I want to share the blessings God gives me.
lender.occupational_info: Database conversions.

lender.name: mungo
lender.loan_because: Small changes have big effects.
lender.occupational_info: I have long conversations with a glowing box.

lender.name: Abduljaman
lender.loan_because: to sustain my consultancy firm in order to serve fellow being and the world. Without honest and sustainable incomes, all my short write-up will cut-off from the scene.
lender.occupational_info: Indeed is a rare someone who care the world without being molded to righteousness. In my entire life all my short write-up to the world will justify to love and cares humanity irregardless who they are: I really against all kinds of violence motives in this world. Life is so precious created by God with purpose need not to sacrifice by other fellow being with the same creation.

lender.name: andreia
lender.loan_because: Gostaria de investir no pequeno escritorio que tenho em minha casa,moveis como escrivaninha,cadeira,arquivo,etc.
lender.occupational_info: Serviços contabeis para empresas,autonomos, entidades sociais. Area fiscal,trabalhista,etc.

lender.name: Ayeshya
lender.loan_because: I can!

lender.name: Holly
lender.loan_because: I love helping others in any way I can.
lender.occupational_info: I care for babies that are born to early.

lender.name: Kristin
lender.loan_because: Sometimes people just need a small hand to get on their feet and make a big difference in their lives and their families lives

lender.name: photospassion.ch
lender.loan_because: It's a concrete way to help others. It feels like you are making a little bit of difference in the world.

lender.name: Camerali Uniti
lender.occupation: Group of friends from Chamber of Commerce of Prato

lender.name: Abby
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good to help people and I would want someone to help me if I needed it.
lender.occupational_info: I was an electrician who worked in New York City. I got hurt at work and am now retired. I installed electric work in many buildings in the city

lender.name: Øyvind Aasbrenn
lender.loan_because: People deserve a chance

lender.name: Cory
lender.loan_because: I can, and it works

lender.name: tito harris
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to help others help themselves...
lender.occupational_info: I help managers to get the best from their people by challenging their own view of the world and their motivation to become a manager in the first place...

lender.name: Lucky Family
lender.loan_because: Because we are lucky enough to be able to.
lender.occupational_info: Financial manager, attorney mom and great kids.

lender.name: Jo
lender.loan_because: I love the idea of helping people become self-sufficient without the banksters profiting.
lender.occupational_info: Software and equipment testing

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I have a strong belief in giving people a hand and NOT a hand out
lender.occupational_info: I teach mortgage lending classes in the State of North Carolina, U.S.

lender.name: Kristin
lender.occupation: Student at Virginia Tech in Virginia, USA

lender.name: TIM
lender.loan_because: i was invited to. A simple yet brilliantly effective way to help and I'm chuffed to be involved.

lender.name: Alexandra
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good!!
lender.occupational_info: I help people with mental illness develop the skills they need to live safely and happily in the community.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I enjoy assisting others that have a desire to improve their lives.

lender.name: Kristin
lender.loan_because: I have been fortunate and wish the same for others.
lender.occupational_info: I support the work of others.

lender.name: Christina
lender.loan_because: "Remember, if you ever need a helping hand, it's at the end of your arm. As you get older, remember you have another hand: the first is to help yourself, the second is to help others." ~ Audrey Hepburn
lender.occupational_info: I write technical manuals and documentation for software systems.

lender.name: Stéphanie
lender.loan_because: I am grateful for what I have, I want to share a little!

lender.name: ContrailsOverBoston
lender.occupational_info:
sounds come out and are documented

Kiva allows me to help others, learn about the world, and save money.

lender.occupational_info: I'm just a kid.

lender.name: Joe Grabol
lender.loan_because: To give some thing back.
lender.occupational_info: Selling autos.

lender.name: M.S.
lender.loan_because: Because sharing a little of what I have, hopefully will make a very big difference in another person's life.

lender.name: Thomas

lender.name: Rich
lender.loan_because: I like to help people
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers and new technology in a healthcare setting

lender.name: Ben Parizek
lender.loan_because: The creative diversity of local entrepreneurship is an inspiring solution to Hayek's knowledge problem (and possibly the best return on investment towards these ends).

lender.name: john
lender.loan_because: i need a loans to achieve my aims and objective in life, i really want to invest in buying stocks and shares in the market
lender.occupational_info: i am an accounting teacher

lender.name: Jotwyla
lender.loan_because: I enjoy empowering people!
lender.occupational_info: To bring restoration and empowerment to the lives of others

lender.name: Chelle
lender.loan_because: The ripple effect - by helping one we help each other.
lender.occupational_info: My organization helps manufacturers in WI so they can survive and thrive in the global economy.

lender.name: Ricardo
lender.loan_because: Education is the way for evolution.
lender.occupational_info: I fly.

lender.name: Melissa, Matt, Max, Asia
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do
lender.occupational_info: take care of sick people & write stories

lender.name: Pam
lender.loan_because: We all need to help each other out ! Many people have helped me throughout my life -- sometimes with information, other times with material needs. I like to do the same when & where I can !
lender.occupational_info: Database programmer -- I sit in an office all day and program computers, also deal with a lot of people. It pays the bills, nothing exciting.

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: It's fun, it's useful, and it feels good.
lender.occupational_info: Help people with health problems stay at home.

lender.name: Ellen
lender.loan_because: I believe people can bring about change if they make the effort.

lender.name: Reuven
lender.loan_because: Together we can do all those things we cannot do alone.
lender.occupational_info: I help technology companies grow.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: it is important for us to help one another in this world.
lender.occupational_info: I am a university student studying Human Services with a minor in Women's and Gender Studies.

lender.name: Howard
lender.loan_because: The return on investments through Kiva comes in the form of helping people help themselves. There is no greater return on an investment in my opinion!

lender.name: Jen
lender.occupation: CA State Office of AIDS - Health Program Analyst
lender.loan_because: I believe that each of us can make a difference in the world by doing something that may seem small, to someone else can mean something greater and wonderful.
lender.occupational_info: I am in HIV prevention for the California State Office of AIDS. I work with different counties within the state to provide to their communities the best education and prevention programs for HIV/AIDS.

lender.name: Dmitriy
lender.loan_because: It makes the world a better place

lender.name: Kyle and Susie
lender.occupation: Law Student and Special Ed Teacher
lender.loan_because:
if you give a man a fish you feed him for a day; teach a man to fish and you feed him for a lifetime.
We want to help buy fishing poles for the women.
lender.occupational_info: Study, study, study, take exam. Repeat.

lender.name: Marie, Tom & Cathi
lender.loan_because: We like the idea and intention of Kiva and we believe that micro loans are a very useful way to help the entrepreneurs and their families.
lender.occupational_info: Tom: I sell facility management services Marie: I sell insurance esp. occupational pension schemes Cathi: I go to school

lender.name: Jacqueline
lender.loan_because: "Charity is injurious unless it helps the recipient to become independent of it." -John D. Rockefeller & this is that kind of charity. Plus it feels good!

lender.name: Pat
lender.loan_because: I want to encourage persons who wish to be independent and self supporting. I have felt so fortunate in what I have been blessed with I want to share by helping others.
lender.occupational_info: Retired, widowed, mother of 4, 7 grandchildren and 2 great grandchildren.

lender.name: Deanna
lender.loan_because: I believe every little bit helps.
lender.occupational_info: I provide aesthetic services and retail products to clients. Making others look and feel good makes me feel good.

lender.name: amanda
lender.occupational_info: I run a department in a labor union that assists non-union workers in forming a union.

lender.name: Dagmar
lender.loan_because: ...everyone deserves a chance...

lender.name: Jorge
lender.loan_because: You can never know how such a little help could make a different better world...

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: I want to set an example for my daughter.
lender.occupational_info: I play guitar and sing.

lender.name: Malavika & Ashwin
lender.loan_because: it is a great way to help give people the opportunities they need to be successful, and better their communities.

lender.name: Roberta
lender.loan_because: I want to be a part of empowering others to be successful at working for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I teach woodworking to adults.

lender.name: Puja
lender.loan_because: Remember, if you ever need a helping hand, you'll find one at the end of your arm... As you grow older you will discover that you have two hands. One for helping yourself, the other for helping others. ~ Audrey Hepburn

lender.name: gita
lender.loan_because: In helping others, I help myself, for whatever good I give out completes the circle and comes back to me.The more I help others to succeed, the more I succeed.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I can and I should. All people of any moderate means should participate in this program or programs like it.
lender.occupational_info: I am the founder of an interactive games television channel like no other in the world.

lender.name: Kawika
lender.loan_because: I love seeing business opportunity opened up or expanded to give someone the chance to do better.
lender.occupational_info: I photograph the beautiful local girls here in Hawaii. With the help of my wife, we also self publish our own calendars.

lender.name: Nima
lender.loan_because:
"We make a living by what we get, but we make a life by what we give."
-Winston Churchill

lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I write books that explain how complicated computer software works.

lender.name: Christine & Waddell
lender.loan_because: we can! :)

lender.name: Bea
lender.occupational_info: I teach people to be teachers of young children.

lender.name: Jentru
lender.loan_because: I like to give someone an opportunity to achieve a goal.
lender.occupational_info: I provide Medical Billing management, and support to medical practices.

lender.name: Chris Wellman
lender.loan_because: With all of the technology and resources that we have today, all humans should have the opportunity to make a living for themselves, if they chose to work for it.
lender.occupational_info: I own an exterior maintenance company. Our services are as follows: build and restore decks and fences, gutter installation/repair/cleaning, window cleaning, trim and remove shrubs and trees, clean dryer vents, painting, lay mulch, etc.

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: I want to dedicate myself to helping others.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I think we can do a lot of good in the world through micro loans. As the great micro-credit pioneer Muhammed Yunus once said, "One day our grandchildren will go to museums to see what poverty was like."
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student at the University of South Florida studying Mechanical Engineering.

lender.name: Allison
lender.loan_because: every person deserves a fair chance to improve his or her own life. Microfinance gives people that chance and makes a sustainable difference.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a 2nd year student at UCLA School of Law

lender.name: Gregory
lender.loan_because: I have the luck to own my own business and I want to pass the possibility on to whomever is willing to work hard and suceed.
lender.occupational_info: I sell hobby items to people who enjoy using the items that I sell.

lender.name: Jen Lawrence
lender.loan_because: Loaning through Kiva is one way of being (part of) the change I wish to see in this world. Many Kiva users will probably recognize that thought from Mahatma Ghandi.
lender.occupational_info: I work with faculty members to secure funding from private foundations for research projects. Much of my work involves writing and editing grant proposals. I am working on an advanced degree (MFA) in fiction writing, and I have a novel in the works.

lender.name: Barb and Jim
lender.loan_because: my son, daughter in law and granddaughter gave us this for Christmas.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: It's important to spread money into countries where people struggle everyday; to offer hope of a stronger economy for others.
lender.occupational_info: I am a graphic designer and develop printed materials which help my organization raise money for the less fortunate.

lender.name: Quesnel Forest staff
lender.loan_because: We actually do this as an office. we sold some baked goods and donated items for sale and we raised this to have an impact.

lender.name: Leah
lender.loan_because: I want to help others to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I inspire young minds to love science and understand how science can help the world.

lender.name: Wayne
lender.loan_because: I like to make a positive influence on other lives in the world.

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: As part of my occupation I have chosen to be part of the Kiva community and its noble mission.

lender.name: Stan
lender.loan_because: someone gave me an opportunity when I first started my business.

lender.name: Joshua
lender.loan_because: God said so Deuteronomy 15:6

lender.name: Amelia
lender.loan_because: I am a small business owner myself and know the struggles of getting started. I feel it is a blessing to be fortunate enough to be able to assist those that do not have the luxeries we have in America.
lender.occupational_info: I offer legal assistance to people. I specialize in finding information that is not readily available to the public and preparing people in their legal needs.

lender.name: Kimberly
lender.loan_because: Through Kiva, I know exactly where my funds are going and I can choose whom I want to help. Helping others is what makes me happy.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the Accounting department at a children's hospital in south Texas. I monitor incoming and outgoing funds (hospital business, not patient related) and make sure that everything balances.

lender.name: Toby
lender.loan_because: We can impact the lives of others --make them healthier, happier, sustainable.
lender.occupational_info:
I help food companies develop new products including formula (recipes), packaging and food safety.
I assist with ensuring the product is sold to the consumer in the very best strategic manner in order to reach the customers goals/vision/passion.
Taste, Value, Convenience and Health are key factors to a successful food product.
I offer guidance and support to optimize success and instill confidence as their business idea progresses.

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: something that makes no difference for me can make a big difference for someone else. In a global economy we are all responsible for each other and should do what we can.
lender.occupational_info: I work in television commercial production.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I believe in being an active member of the global community and I believe in micro-businesses and the opportunity to break the cycle of poverty.

lender.name: Susan
lender.occupation: sheep farmer & food/garden writer and photographer
lender.loan_because: I think what Kiva is doing is wonderful!
lender.occupational_info: I am thankful to live on a 240 acre remote Missouri farm where I naturally raise sheep, chickens, and donkeys, tend a large organic heirloom kitchen garden and greenhouse, bake bread, and always eat very well. Through my award-winning blog, Farmgirl Fare, I share recipes, stories, and photos of my crazy country life with people all over the world, encouraging them to seek out local and organic food--and maybe even grow some of their own!

lender.name: Henrik
lender.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves.

lender.name: gareth
lender.loan_because: Allah /god / Budda said its a good idea
lender.occupational_info: Dull and uneventfull

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I did not have much in my earlier years. After 45 years of work I come to my retirement with enough to get me through. I believe strongly that having two coats obligates me to give one of them to one who has none.
lender.occupational_info: The last 25 years were spent helping people with physical or mental handicaps prepare for and obtain gainful employment.

lender.name: Andrzej
lender.loan_because: I want to be a faithful follower of Jesus Christ.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English in a primary school.

lender.name: Judy
lender.occupation: government affairs for natural gas company

lender.name: Adi
lender.loan_because: I think it is our role to do what we can to make the world a better place in every way possible. Helping those who are trying to develop something positive in area frought with trouble seems a worthwhile way to do just that.
lender.occupational_info: I study psychology and specifically drug addiction and other addictions (gambling and such). I will hopefully be getting my PhD within 2 years.

lender.name: Vince
lender.loan_because: I've been to Peru for Christmas 2008, I love this country and want to help the people
lender.occupational_info: I do drawing on a computer

lender.name: nadia
lender.loan_because: God has given me so much, I can only try and give back as much.
lender.occupational_info: I look at houses and businesses for different insurance companies.

lender.name: Ashley
lender.loan_because: The world is hungry for compassion.

lender.name: Billy
lender.loan_because: I know what it is like to try and start or run a business when you have very little resources. My business has grown to a multi million dollar company over the past 15 years and I am glad that I can hopefully help someone to reach their goals
lender.occupational_info: My Company makes and sells personal security products and sporting good items .

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: It's the least I can do. I wish it could be more.
lender.occupational_info: I train end users how to use medical electronic record programs (via the computer).

lender.name: Melina
lender.loan_because: I am able and I believe
lender.occupational_info: Link agencies and individuals with resources

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I care.
lender.occupational_info: I save the planet through nagging.

lender.name: Art
lender.loan_because: I love being able to help others who are willing to help themselves. Sometimes we all need a lilttle help in achieving our goals, and I'm happy to be a small part of that
lender.occupational_info: I take care of the stations, firetrucks, equipment, etc. so other firefighters can do their jobs saving lives.

lender.name: Genne
lender.loan_because: I love the USA,second i love my artworksin mosaic,third I need have a many conexions with people about new ideas,exportations,expositions,at last to keep in suspense about new businesses! In the past I sold for many peoples in USA,Europe,Canada,and Mexico!And initiate a news freedons with proples responsibles ,of course!
lender.occupational_info: i work in my personal atellier that stayed in Gravatá city too.my job is very agreble,nice ,and I am a people very content!a very happy! with my work!I am working 8 at 10 hours all day,because i dont have another peoples for help me,because your costs is very high! ,Even so i will be continued in my occupations all days!

lender.name: Renee
lender.occupational_info: Nick is a sommelier and I own a restaurant and catering company.

lender.name: Amadou
lender.loan_because: I understand the benefit of helping those who are in needs.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student in the U.S and I understand the benefit of helping those who are in needs.

lender.name: marsha/miguel
lender.loan_because: I love people!

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: This form of giving is wonderful as it gives people the financial help they need. More importantly, it also gives them the confidence and sense of accomplishment that can truly change their life, not just their immediate circumstances.

lender.name: pedro
lender.loan_because: Is a good way to help poor people of the world earn a living
lender.occupational_info: working with other employees to serve the citizens of san francisco, california

lender.name: Mickey B
lender.loan_because: To help those with an entrepreneurial spirit in less fortunate countries.
lender.occupational_info: Internet related

lender.name: Dan & Karmen
lender.loan_because: I want to provide opportunities for extraordinary people to accomplish extraordinary things.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: every bit makes a difference
lender.occupational_info: how economics can make an impact on global welfare

lender.name: Stephan
lender.loan_because: this is an incredible way to make an impact.
lender.occupational_info: I help individuals to get financing to purchase homes.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: We need to help one another as best as we can. I've been blessed with being born into a middle class family in a safe and stable country. I know how fortunate I am and am very grateful. It's important to me to do what I can to help others and to teach my children about the importance of being in the world outside of our home and community.

lender.name: R&K
lender.loan_because: My piece of bread only belongs to me when I know that everyone else has a share, and that no one starves while I eat. ~Leo Tolstoy

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: Its needed in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I'm the guy that approves mortgage loans to people to help them reach for their dream of home ownership.

lender.name: Constantino Ferrer
lender.loan_because: We need to start embracing and building up each other... Period!
lender.occupational_info: I make scary movies...

lender.name: Will
lender.loan_because: I loan to others because I think that it is the right thing to do and I want to help others across the world who need loans.
lender.occupational_info: I am in the fifth grade and I play on a lacrosse team.

lender.name: Todd & Paige
lender.loan_because: It is a great way to teach our boys about the world and helping people.
lender.occupational_info: Customer service and inventory management. Restaurant management.

lender.name: Louis Herrera
lender.loan_because: sometimes a little boost is all it takes to help someone reach and achieve their goals.
lender.occupational_info: I own a residential real estate brokerage. We provide consumers with two full-service models of real estate services: traditional and hourly.

lender.name: Asdis
lender.loan_because: it makes me feel good

lender.name: Homer & Marian
lender.loan_because: KIVA.org is a very simple method of having a big impact in the lives of those who need the funds to advance their income and economic stability.

lender.name: Jeff & Lauri
lender.loan_because: We like to help others help themselves. Sometimes all it takes is a small contribution for someone to fulfill their dreams.

lender.name: Shane
lender.loan_because: I Can

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: I like to know that something someone else needs can be achived with my help
lender.occupational_info: i go to school

lender.name: Kumi
lender.loan_because: everyone should have the opportunity to make a better life for themselves.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: It is wonderful how what seems to be such a small amount in this country can change peoples lives and give them a hopeful future in other countries. This makes me feel good to be able to help very hard working appreciative people. Especially women.
lender.occupational_info: I have the gift of easing peoples pain with massage.

lender.name: Misty
lender.loan_because: Romans 12:13

lender.name: Allie
lender.loan_because: I want to change a life =]
lender.occupational_info: a student!

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I value people who are willing to help improve themselves through ideas and hard work

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: I want to empower people to effect positive change in their families and communities, because it is a small step towards reducing the inequalities in the world and because I am inspired by the tenacity of the Kiva entrepreneurs.

lender.name: Bridgette
lender.loan_because: It's important to help others to stand on their own two feet.
lender.occupational_info: I research community participation in development planning as well as environmental justice along the U.S.-Mexico border

lender.name: Emma
lender.loan_because: you can keep giving and helping those to gain a better life. I have and am a strong activist against many things.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently a student and am studying hard. I also sing and i ride/work with horses.

lender.name: Rick
lender.loan_because: It cost me so little to help someone else
lender.occupational_info: I work to track contamination below the earth's surface

lender.name: Genevieve
lender.loan_because: I want to help people.

lender.name: gregory
lender.loan_because: My mother worked hard supporting five children on her own. She continues to give of herself and the world is deffintlly a better place with her in it. I loan with the hope to make life easier for other hard working women.

lender.name: Imogen
lender.loan_because: I want to be a part of doing something to help others
lender.occupational_info: I work at a University providing housing for the students

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I know how hard it is to start a business in a blessed place like the US - I can't imagine what it is like in other countries without as many opportunities as we have. I admire these individuals immensely and want to help in any small way I can.
lender.occupational_info: Business coach and strategic planner for small business entrepreneurs. So I help people starting a company to know what to do, how to do it, and help them become successful at it.

lender.name: Jaye and Steve
lender.loan_because: it is important to make a difference in the world.
lender.occupational_info: Jaye is a college chemistry instructor and Steve is a critical care nurse.

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: I believe in small projects, big hearts, and infinite possibilities.

lender.name: Nuriza
lender.loan_because: microloans make a real difference to honest, hardworking people, giving them the opportunity to further themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I run my family business which has interest in varied industries.
